channel.title: Hacked! Harry Hog Football: The Original Washington Redskins Fan Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Harry Hog Football
channel.description:
Washington Redskins football through the eyes of three of their fans: Aaron, Josh, and John. Write us at: redskinsfan@harryhogfootball.com
Hail to the Redskins!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Aaron, Josh, and John, three huge Redskins fans discuss the games in their own words. Redskins news and commentary, trivia, and much, more.
channel.itunes:summary:
Washington Redskins football through the eyes of three of their fans: Aaron, Josh, and John. Write us at: redskinsfan@harryhogfootball.com
